entry.dcterms:subject: TÁRKI Joint Research Center TDATA-G37: TÁRKI ESS 2005. European Social Survey 2005. The comparatie study of the european societies. Hungarian database.. data sheet. Version: 2007-04-25
entry.dcterms:creator: Füstös, László
entry.dcterms:contributor: Hungarian Academy of Sciences Institute of Political Sciences
entry.dcterms:description: The ESS study consist on two parts: a standard module and a rotational module. The rotation module has two or three block, and the standard part of the study monitoring the socila trends including the following topics: the confidence for the institutions, the media usage, the political commitment and participation, the social political orientations, the government's judgement, ethical, social and political norms, ethnic and religious identifying, health conditions, safety, psychological well--being and naturally the social-demographic background informations.
